author: Jess Bravin
title: Rosenstein Takes a Pause—to Argue a Case Before the Supreme Court
text:
WASHINGTON—As if Rod Rosenstein’s week hadn’t been stressful enough, a package from the White House arrived Friday afternoon at his office at the Justice Department. He opened it carefully.
“These are my official Donald Trump cuff links,” said Mr. Rosenstein, the deputy attorney general. As the official overseeing Mr. Trump’s bête noire, the special counsel probe of alleged Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election, Mr. Rosenstein isn’t used to plaudits from the White House.
...
